pullRequest.title: Updates to EntityData
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
This PR aims to do some changes to EnityData:

Introduce an EntityUtils class, which can simplify some of the steps in EntityData, as well as provide some simple methods for getting/setting age of entities that can be used in future expressions/effects/conditions/etc.
Fix an issue with some age comparisons of entities (see #3252)

This has been well tested and works very nicely :)

Target Minecraft Versions: Any
Requirements: none
Related Issues: #3252

commit.message:
Changes to EntityData
- Simply baby/adult settings using new EntityUtil class
- Fix an issue with comparing some entities' baby/adult status

+package ch.njol.skript.bukkitutil;
+
+import org.bukkit.entity.Ageable;
+import org.bukkit.entity.Entity;
+import org.bukkit.entity.Piglin;
+import org.bukkit.entity.Zoglin;
+import org.bukkit.entity.Zombie;
+
+import ch.njol.skript.Skript;
+
+/**
+ * Utility class for quick {@link Entity} methods
+ */
+public class EntityUtils {
+	
+	private static final boolean HAS_PIGLINS = Skript.classExists("org.bukkit.entity.Piglin");
+	
+	/**
+	 * Check if an entity is ageable.
+	 * Some entities, such as zombies, do not have an age but can be a baby/adult.
+	 *
+	 * @param entity Entity to check
+	 * @return True if entity is ageable
+	 */
+	public static boolean isAgeable(Entity entity) {
+		if (entity instanceof Ageable || entity instanceof Zombie)
+			return true;
+		else return HAS_PIGLINS && (entity instanceof Piglin || entity instanceof Zoglin);

commit.message: EntityData - manually update from current master
